projects.name: SocialHub
projects.description: User Authentication: Implemented user sign-up, sign-in, authorization, and authentication functionalities. Post Interaction: Developed features for users to create posts and interact with others posts through comments and likes. Content Management: Implemented secure mechanisms for users to delete their own posts, likes, and comments. Social Networking: Designed functionality for adding and removing friends within the platform. User Interface: Implemented user interface components to view profiles and interact with other users. Real-Time Chat: Enabled users to chat with one another in real-time.

projects.name: Blog Site
projects.description: User can create posts that are stored on Firebase database and visible on the home page of the Blog site. By clicking on name of the post visible on home page user can view the content of the post.

projects.name: Music-Site
projects.description: It is a static site built using HTML and CSS. Responsive site.

experiences.description: Task Automation: Automated onboarding processes to eliminate manual effort, significantly improving efficiency and reducing errors. Gen-AI Query Platform: Designed a Gen-AI powered query answering platform that retrieves information from Adobe verified resources, enhancing internal support and communication. Productivity Bots: Developed bots using machine learning to enhance productivity and resource utilization across various departments. Quality Audits: Automated the process of reviewing the performance of engineers under managers using machine learning, improving accuracy and consistency in quality audits.

full_output.name: Manika Goyal
achievements_and_awards: First Rank in CSE- Department in 5th and 6th Semester GPA: 9.75
